column4: /boot would need to be ext3 or something, / can (and usually is) LVM...
you say that grub can boot from a ext3 /boot inside a LVM? Or do you mean that I need a separate /boot partition outside the LVM?
no, not inside the LVM... /boot would just be ext3... you can't boot from LVM volumes.
OK, I thought so. But the sarge pre-RC2 *can* boot from a LVM using lilo...
